page.title: 02Letter-A walk near Faversham
page.content:
Field Study Trip: 14th. June '85
Dear Parents Weather permitting,we intend to start our Domesday Project with a field study day. Having a first hand look at the area and in particular our "D-Block." A packed lunch will be required as will suitable clothing and footwear for a walking day. (NO GLASS BOTTLES PLEASE!) We will leave school at 9.30 a.m. and return at approximately 3.00 p.m.
My child will/will not be able to go on the Field Study Trip on Friday 14th. June. Signed................
I am able/not able to help with this vist.
